name: mcp-zenml
description: MCP server to connect an MCP client with your ZenML MLOps and LLMOps pipelines
long_description: The server provides MCP tools to access core read functionality from the ZenML server, delivering live information about users, stacks, pipelines, pipeline runs, pipeline steps, services, stack components, flavors, pipeline run templates, schedules, artifacts (metadata about data artifacts, not the data itself), service connectors, step code, and step logs (if the step was run on a cloud-based stack), while also enabling you to trigger new pipeline runs when a run template is present.

zenml_store_url.title: ZenML Server URL
zenml_store_url.description: The URL of your ZenML server (e.g., https://your-server.cloudinfra.zenml.io)

tools.name: get_step_logs
tools.description: Get the logs for a specific step run.

tools.name: list_users
tools.description: List all users in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific user.

tools.name: get_active_user
tools.description: Get the currently active user.

tools.name: get_stack
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific stack.

tools.name: easter_egg
tools.description: Returns the ZenML MCP easter egg.

tools.name: list_stacks
tools.description: List all stacks in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: list_pipelines
tools.description: List all pipelines in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_pipeline_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific pipeline.

tools.name: get_service
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific service.

tools.name: list_services
tools.description: List all services in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_stack_component
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific stack component.

tools.name: list_stack_components
tools.description: List all stack components in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_flavor
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific flavor.

tools.name: list_flavors
tools.description: List all flavors in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: trigger_pipeline
tools.description: Trigger a pipeline to run from the server.

tools.name: get_run_template
tools.description: Get a run template for a pipeline.

tools.name: list_run_templates
tools.description: List all run templates in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_schedule
tools.description: Get a schedule for a pipeline.

tools.name: list_schedules
tools.description: List all schedules in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_pipeline_run
tools.description: Get a pipeline run by name, ID, or prefix.

tools.name: list_pipeline_runs
tools.description: List all pipeline runs in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_run_step
tools.description: Get a run step by name, ID, or prefix.

tools.name: list_run_steps
tools.description: List all run steps in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: list_artifacts
tools.description: List all artifacts in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: list_secrets
tools.description: List all secrets in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_service_connector
tools.description: Get a service connector by name, ID, or prefix.

tools.name: list_service_connectors
tools.description: List all service connectors in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_model
tools.description: Get a model by name, ID, or prefix.

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: List all models in the ZenML workspace.

tools.name: get_model_version
tools.description: Get a model version by name, ID, or prefix.

tools.name: list_model_versions
tools.description: List all model versions for a model.

tools.name: get_step_code
tools.description: Get the code for a step.

prompts.name: stack_components_analysis
prompts.description: Analyze the stacks in the ZenML workspace
prompts.text: Please generate a comprehensive report or dashboard on our ZenML stack components, showing which ones are most frequently used across our pipelines, including information about version compatibility issues and performance variations.

prompts.name: recent_runs_analysis
prompts.description: Analyze the recent runs in the ZenML workspace
prompts.text: Please generate a comprehensive report or dashboard on our recent runs, showing which pipelines are most frequently run and which ones are most frequently failed. Include information about the status of the runs, the duration, and the stack components used.
